bill.title: Abortion; prohibit an abortion of a fetus with a detectable heartbeat without informed written consent except in medical emergency.
bill.description: An Act To Codify Section 41-41-34.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Prohibit An Abortion Of An Unborn Human Individual With A Detectable Fetal Heartbeat Without The Informed Written Consent Of The Pregnant Woman Except When A Medical Emergency Necessitates; To Authorize And Direct The State Board Of Health To Promulgate Regulations For The Appropriate Methods Of Performing An Examination For The Presence Of A Fetal Heartbeat; To Amend Section 73-25-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That A Physician Performing An Abortion On A Pregnant Woman Prior To Determining If The Fetus Has A Detectable Fetal Heartbeat Is Subject To License Revocation Or Disciplinary Action; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Judiciary, Division B
